settings.cardHtml:
<!-- Copy this html code to your HTML Widget -->
<!-- This code only show a content of another webpage embeded in the widget,
so we are displaying the pure video URL, for our video stream purpose.
-->

<html>

<iframe id="video-src"
    title="Video stream from IP Webcam server"
    width="100%"
    height="100%"
    frameborder="0"
    scrolling="no"
    marginheight="0"
    marginwidth="0"
    align="middle"
    
    src="http://localhost:8080/video"> <!-- Replace with your video stream URL here in "src", by default IP Webcam application puts video stream at "/video" --> 



</html>
